channel.title: CVE Feed for Amazing Little poll -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Amazing Little poll -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-6768|2023-12-20T09:49:36.723Z -- amazing%20little%20poll -- amazing%20little%20poll
item.description: Authentication bypass vulnerability in Amazing Little Poll affecting versions 1.3 and 1.4. This vulnerability could allow an unauthenticated user to access the admin panel without providing any credentials by simply accessing the "lp_admin.php?adminstep=" parameter.

item.title: CVE-2023-6769|2023-12-20T09:50:44.480Z -- amazing%20little%20poll -- amazing%20little%20poll
item.description: Stored XSS vulnerability in Amazing Little Poll, affecting versions 1.3 and 1.4. This vulnerability allows a remote attacker to store a malicious JavaScript payload in the "lp_admin.php" file in the "question" and "item" parameters. This vulnerability could lead to malicious JavaScript execution while the page is loading.
